## Source: ossf-package-analysis (eb7ac91dd5a55c67e31e4875b9f32f5a8778e2d25e69dc79e81d418356990fa8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@grafanacloud/plugins-platform-backend' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
